spell_tooltip.description: Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 128,248 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

Heart Strike hits up to 3 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 40% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 20%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 11.6 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by 90%, decaying by 10% every sec.

Strike an enemy for 51,969 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 235,393 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 137,175 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 8% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 429,953 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Casting Anti-Magic Shell grants 2 nearby allies a Lesser Anti-Magic Shell that Absorbs up to 299,895 magic damage and reduces the duration of harmful Magic effects against them by 50%.

Viciously slice into the soul of your enemy, dealing 171,469 Shadowfrost damage and applying Reaper's Mark.

Each time you deal Shadow or Frost damage, add a stack of Reaper's Mark. After 12 sec or reaching 40 stacks, the mark explodes, dealing 12,349 damage per stack.

Reaper's Mark travels to an unmarked enemy nearby if the target dies, or explodes below 35% health when there are no enemies to travel to. This explosion cannot occur again on a target for 3 min.

Reaper's Mark sends forth bursts of Shadowfrost energy and back, dealing 78,041 Shadowfrost damage both ways to all enemies caught in its path.

Wave of Souls critical strikes cause enemies to take 5% increased Shadowfrost damage for 15 sec, stacking up to 2 times, and it is always a critical strike on its way back.
Your Blood Plague has a chance to deal 30% increased damage as Shadowfrost.

Shadowfrost damage applies 2 stacks to Reaper's Mark and 4 stacks when it is a critical strike.

Additionally, Blood Boil deals Shadowfrost damage.

When Reaper's Mark explodes, it deals 10% of the damage dealt damage to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced physical damage to you for 10 sec.
Reaper's Mark explosion deals up to 30% increased damage based on your target's missing health, and applies Soul Reaper to targets below 35% health.

When you suffer a damaging effect equal to 25% of your maximum health, you instantly cast Death Pact at 50% effectiveness. May only occur every 2 min.

When a Reaper's Mark explodes, the cooldowns of this effect and Death Pact are reduced by 5 sec.
Reaper's Mark's cost is reduced by 1 Rune and its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Blood Plague deals its damage in half the duration and the second scythe of Exterminate applies Blood Plague.
When an enemy deals direct damage to your Anti-Magic Shell, their cast speed is reduced by 10% for 6 sec.

After Reaper's Mark explodes, your next Marrowrend costs no Rune and summons 2 scythes to strike your enemies.

The first scythe strikes your target for 316,216 Shadowfrost damage and has a 20% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 168,313 Shadowfrost damage and applies Blood Plague. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Instantly strike the target and 1 other nearby enemy, causing 70,562 Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by 20% for 8 sec, plus 2 Runic Power per additional enemy struck.

Your Death Coil and Death Strike have a 10% chance to make your next Heart Strike become Vampiric Strike.

Vampiric Strike heals you for 1% of your maximum health and grants you Essence of the Blood Queen, increasing your Haste by 1.0%, up to 5.0% for 20 sec.

Smash the target, dealing 73,662 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

 cffffffffBone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 49,216. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

Deals 64,458 Shadow damage and infects all enemies within 10 yds with Blood Plague.

 cffffffffBlood Plague
A shadowy disease that drains 109,152 health from the target over 12 sec.
Embrace your undeath, increasing your maximum health by 30% and increasing all healing and absorbs received by 30% for 10 sec.

When you would pull an enemy generate 1 charge of Bone Shield.

 cffffffffBone Shield
Surrounds you with a barrier of whirling bones, increasing Armor by 49,216. Each melee attack against you consumes a charge. Lasts 30 sec or until all charges are consumed.

While you have at least 5 Bone Shield charges, the cost of Death Strike is reduced by 5 Runic Power.

Additionally, your maximum Runic Power is increased by 10.
Heart Strike damage increased by 30%.
When you lose a Bone Shield charge the damage of your next Marrowrend is increased by 15%, stacking up to 75%.
Heart Strike generates 2 additional Runic Power per target hit.

Summons a rune weapon for 14 sec that mirrors your melee attacks and bolsters your defenses.

While active, you gain 35% parry chance.
Each enemy hit by Blood Boil increases the damage and healing done by your next Death Strike by 8%, stacking up to 5 times.
When Crimson Scourge is consumed, you gain 6% Versatility for 6 sec.
Bone Shield increases your Haste by 10%.
Dancing Rune Weapon generates 5 Bone Shield charges. When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by 5 sec.

Your Blood Plague and Death and Decay deal damage 15% more often.

Additionally, your Blood Plague leeches 50% more Health.
Increases Armor gained from Bone Shield by 10% and it can stack 2 additional times.
Summons 1 additional copy of Dancing Rune Weapon and increases its duration by 6 sec.
Death Strike's healing is increased by 15% and grants you 12% Leech for 8 sec.
Enemies affected by Blood Plague take 5% increased damage from you and Death Strike increases the damage of your Blood Plague by 25% for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges. For each charge consumed, you gain 6 Runic Power and absorb damage equal to 6% of your maximum health for 8 sec.

Strikes all enemies in front of you with a hungering attack that deals 89,877 Physical damage and heals you for 150% of that damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Causes your Blood Plague damage to occur 30% more quickly for 6 sec. 

enerates 2 Runes.
You deal 6% more damage and receive 5% more healing while standing in your Death and Decay.
When Bone Shield is consumed it shatters dealing 4,890 Shadow damage to nearby enemies. This damage is tripled while you are within your Death and Decay.
Heart Strike has a chance to increase the damage of your next Death Strike by 20%.
Blood Shield's duration is increased by 2 sec and it absorbs 20% more damage.
Reduces the cooldown on Vampiric Blood by 2.0 sec per 10 Runic Power spent.

Consume up to 5 Bone Shield charges to create a whirl of bone and gore that batters all nearby enemies, dealing 32,808 Shadow damage every 1 sec, and healing you for 2% of your maximum health every time it deals damage (up to 10%). Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Lasts 2 sec per Bone Shield charge spent and rapidly regenerates a Bone Shield every 1 sec.

An unholy pact that prevents fatal damage, instead absorbing incoming healing equal to the damage prevented, lasting 3 sec.

If any healing absorption remains when this effect expires, you will die. This effect may only occur every 4 min.
While Blood Shield is active, you deal 25% increased Physical damage.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 128,791 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.

Death Strike's cost is reduced by 5, and its healing is increased by 5%.

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.

The first scythe strikes your target for 316,477 Shadowfrost damage and has a 20% chance to apply Reaper's Mark, the second scythe strikes all enemies around your target for 167,727 Shadowfrost damage and applies Blood Plague. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Smash the target, dealing 72,602 Physical damage and generating 3 charges of Bone Shield.

Reduces the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon by 50% and its duration by 25%.

Chill your weapon with icy power and quickly strike the enemy, dealing 114,070 Frost damage.
A brutal attack that deals 144,657 Physical damage.

Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing 25,047 Frost damage to that foe, and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

 cffffffffFrost Fever
A disease that deals 191,790 Frost damage over 12 sec and has a chance to grant the Death Knight 5 Runic Power each time it deals damage.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to make your next Obliterate critically strike.
Remorseless Winter deals 6% increased damage to enemies it hits, stacking up to 10 times.
Damaging an enemy with a Runic Power ability increases your Strength by 2% for 10 sec, stacks up to 3 times.
Increases Frost Strike damage by 20%.
Increases Howling Blast damage done by an additional 75%.
Increases Obliterate damage by 10%.
The power of frost increases your Strength by 30% for 12 sec.
Remorseless Winter damage is increased by 35%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to 3 different enemies, you gain Rime.
Obliterate deals 15% increased damage and has a 15% chance to refund 2 runes.
Blow the Horn of Winter, gaining 2 Runes and generating 25 Runic Power.
When Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 15% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.
Reduces Pillar of Frost cooldown by 15 sec.
Empower your rune weapon, gaining 15% Haste and generating 1 Rune and 5 Runic Power instantly and every 5 sec for 20 sec.
Consuming the Killing Machine effect has a 25% chance to grant you 1 Rune.
Summons a frostwyrm who breathes on all enemies within 40 yd in front of you, dealing 427,412 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.
Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by 10%, and extends its duration by 0.5 sec.

Consuming Killing Machine grants 1% critical strike chance for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks your next Killing Machine consumes the stacks and grants you 20% increased Frost damage for 10 sec.

Your auto attack damage is increased by 10%. 

This amount is increased for each stack of Icy Talons you have and it can stack up to 2 additional times.
Casting Howling Blast with Rime active causes jagged icicles to fall on enemies nearby your target, applying Razorice and dealing 25,765 Frost damage.
While Pillar of Frost is active, Frost Strike, Soul Reaper, and Howling Blast always grant Killing Machine and have a 30% chance to generate a Rune. to deal additional damage.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a sleet of ice dealing 86,370  Frost damage to enemies in front of you.
When Frost Strike damages an enemy with 5 stacks of Razorice it will consume them to deal an additional 115% damage.
Consuming Killing Machine fires a Glacial Advance through your target.
While Pillar of Frost is active your auto-attack critical strikes increase its duration by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 sec.
When Frost Strike consumes 5 Razorice stacks, it deals 60% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Enemies within 8 yards of you become shrouded in winter, reducing the range of their spells and abilities by 30%.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike that deals 126,481 Physical damage and heals you for 30.19% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 8.5% of maximum health.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Anti-Magic Shell's cooldown is increased by 20 sec and it now also removes all harmful magic effects when activated.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 418,044 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.

Strikes for 157,912 Physical damage and infects the target with 2-3 Festering Wounds.

 cffffffffFestering Wound
A pustulent lesion that will burst on death or when damaged by Scourge Strike, dealing 27,396 Shadow damage and generating 3 Runic Power.
An unholy strike that deals 66,756 Physical damage and 37,591 Shadow damage, and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time.

Your auto attacks have a 25% chance to make your next Death Coil cost 10 less Runic Power and critically strike. 

Additionally, your next Death Coil will burst 1 Festering Wound.

Your ghoul deals 50,306 Shadow damage to 5 nearby enemies and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity for 15 sec. The ghoul's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.
Your diseases deal 10% more damage and have a 5% increased chance to critically strike.
Festering Strike and Festering Wound damage increased by 20%.
Death Coil and Epidemic increase the duration of Dark Transformation by 1 sec.

Defile the targeted ground, dealing 331,504 Shadow damage to all enemies over 10 sec.

While you remain within your Defile, your Scourge Strike will hit 7 enemies near the target.

Every sec, if any enemies are standing in the Defile, it grows in size and deals increased damage.

Dark Transformation surrounds your ghoul with a vile swarm of insects for 6 sec, stinging all nearby enemies and infecting them with Virulent Plague and an unholy disease that deals 36,360 damage over 14 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
